Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Reroute near Chicago Ave./Michigan
ShortDescription: 66 Chicago buses temp. rerouted WB: Fairbanks, Chicago, Mis Van Der Rohe, Chestnut, Michigan & Chicago; EB Chicago, Michigan, Ohio and Fairbanks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Chicago Ave./Michigan.

Westbound buses will operate via Fairbanks, Chicago, Mis Van Der Rohe, Chestnut, Michigan and Chicago.

Eastbound buses will operate via Chicago, Michigan, Ohio and Fairbanks.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #3 King Drive Temporary Reroute near Chicago Ave./Michigan
ShortDescription: 3 King Drive buses temp. rerouted NB: Michigan, Pearson, Mis Van Der Rohe & Chicago; SB Fairbanks, Chicago, Mis Van Der Rohe, Chestnut & Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Chicago Ave./Michigan.

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Pearson, Mis Van Der Rohe and Chicago.

Southbound buses will operate via Fairbanks, Chicago, Mis Van Der Rohe, Chestnut and Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.
